question_stem.en: A 66-year-old man comes to the hospital due to sudden-onset chest pain and dyspnea. The patient has a history of asthma and gastroesophageal reflux disease but says his current symptoms feel different than what he usually experiences. An ECG is consistent with ST-elevation myocardial infarction, and an emergent cardiac catheterization is performed. Evaluation of the left and right coronary arteries reveals left-dominant circulation. A stenotic region is identified in one of the coronary vessels just before the origin of the artery supplying the atrioventricular node. {{exhibit_1}}
question_stem.zh: 一名66岁男性因突发性胸痛和呼吸困难就医。患者有哮喘和胃食管反流病病史，但表示目前的症状与他通常经历的症状不同。心电图与ST段抬高型心肌梗死相符，并进行了急诊心脏导管插入术。对左右冠状动脉的评估显示为左优势循环。在供应房室结的动脉起源处之前的冠状血管中发现狭窄区域。{{exhibit_1}}

question.en: Which of the following arteries is most likely affected?
question.zh: 以下哪条动脉最有可能受到影响？

explanation.en:
Coronary dominance is determined by the coronary artery that supplies blood to the posterior descending artery [PDA (or posterior interventricular artery)]. The PDA originates from one of the following:

•	Right coronary artery in approximately 70%-80% of the population (right dominant)
•	Left circumflex artery in approximately 5%-10% of the population (left dominant)
•	Both right coronary and left circumflex artery in 10%-20% of the population (codominant)

The atrioventricular (AV) nodal artery most often arises from the dominant coronary artery. This patient has left-dominant coronary circulation; therefore, his atherosclerotic lesion is most likely in the left circumflex artery. Involvement of the AV nodal artery during myocardial infarction can cause varying degrees of AV block. {{exhibit_2}}

(Choice A) The left anter descending artery travels in the anterior interventricular groove and supplies the anterior part of the septum and the anterior wall of the left ventricle. It does not supply the AV node.

(Choice C) The diagonal arteries arise from the left anterior descending artery and supply the anterolateral wall of the left ventricle.

(Choice D) The right coronary artery gives rise to the AV nodal artery in patients with right-dominant or codominant circulation. This patient has left-dominant circulation, so the AV node is most likely supplied by the left circumflex artery.

(Choice E) The right marginal arteries arise from the right coronary artery and supply blood to the free wall of the right ventricle.

Educational objective:
Coronary dominance is determined by the coronary artery supplying the posterior descending artery. The posterior descending artery originates from the right coronary artery in approximately 70%-80% of patients (right dominant), both the right coronary and left circumflex artery in 10%-20% (codominant), and the left circumflex artery in 5%-10% (left dominant). The dominant coronary artery supplies blood to the atrioventricular (AV) node via the AV nodal artery. {{exhibit_3}}
explanation.zh:
冠状动脉优势由供应后降支动脉[PDA（或后室间隔动脉）]的冠状动脉决定。PDA 起源于以下之一：

•	约 70%-80% 的人群中为右冠状动脉（右优势）
•	约 5%-10% 的人群中为左旋支动脉（左优势）
•	10%-20% 的人群中为右冠状动脉和左旋支动脉（共优势）

房室 (AV) 结动脉最常起源于优势冠状动脉。该患者为左优势冠状动脉循环；因此，他的动脉粥样硬化病变最有可能位于左旋支动脉。心肌梗死期间累及 AV 结动脉可引起不同程度的 AV 传导阻滞。{{exhibit_2}}

(选项 A) 左前降支动脉走行于前室间隔沟，供应室间隔前部和左心室前壁。它不供应 AV 结。

(选项 C) 对角支动脉起源于左前降支动脉，供应左心室前外侧壁。

(选项 D) 右冠状动脉为右优势或共优势循环的患者提供 AV 结动脉。该患者为左优势循环，因此 AV 结最有可能由左旋支动脉供应。

(选项 E) 右缘支动脉起源于右冠状动脉，向右心室游离壁供血。

教育目标：
冠状动脉优势由供应后降支动脉的冠状动脉决定。后降支动脉起源于约 70%-80% 患者的右冠状动脉（右优势），10%-20% 患者的右冠状动脉和左旋支动脉（共优势），以及 5%-10% 患者的左旋支动脉（左优势）。优势冠状动脉通过 AV 结动脉向房室 (AV) 结供血。{{exhibit_3}}

summary.en:
This question tests knowledge of coronary artery dominance and the blood supply to the AV node. It requires understanding how left-dominant circulation affects the origin of the AV nodal artery. 

The key to solving this question is recognizing that the patient has left-dominant circulation and that the AV node is supplied by the dominant coronary artery. Therefore, in left-dominant circulation, the left circumflex artery is most likely to supply the AV node.
summary.zh:
此题考察对冠状动脉优势和 AV 结血供的知识。它需要理解左优势循环如何影响 AV 结动脉的起源。

解决此问题的关键在于认识到患者具有左优势循环，并且 AV 结由优势冠状动脉供血。因此，在左优势循环中，左旋支动脉最有可能供应 AV 结。

tags: Coronary artery dominance; AV node; Left circumflex artery; Myocardial infarction; Cardiac catheterization; Cardiology; Atherosclerosis
